qas.question: What kind of broadband service is provided on the island?
What is the maximum speed of the broadband service?
What is the lite price of the broadband service?
What is the gold price of the broadband service?
What location has a few public wifi spots available to the public?

context: <a0_0>ADSL<a0_0/>-broadband service is provided with maximum speeds of up to <a1_0>1536 KBit/s downstream and 512 KBit/s upstream<a1_0/> offered on contract levels from lite <a2_0>£16 per month<a2_0/> to gold+ at <a3_0>£190 per month<a3_0/>. There are a few public WiFi hotspots in <a4_0>Jamestown<a4_0/>, which are also being operated by SURE (formerly Cable & Wireless).
